about_the_game:
Disposable Heroes Modern Gangs

Fantasy Token Pack

This set contains full-color token representations of modern gang figures focusing on thugs, gangsters, gangbangers, and cops, Beautifully illustrated and colored by Joshua Cayne. Two formats are included: full-body figures and top-cropped figures for a larger image.

Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

  • Drug Addict
  • Drug Dealer 1
  • Drug Dealer 2
  • Hooded Assailant
  • Pickpocket
  • Prostitute
  • Gangster Boss
  • Gangster Hitman
  • Gangster Thug 1
  • Gangster Thug 2
  • Gangster Thug 3
  • Punk 1
  • Punk 2
  • Punk 3
  • Red Gangbanger Boss
  • Red Gangbanger Lieutenant
  • Red Gangbanger Thug 1
  • Red Gangbanger Thug 2
  • Blue Gangbanger Boss
  • Blue Gangbanger Lieutenant
  • Blue Gangbanger Thug 1
  • Blue Gangbanger Thug 2
  • Mercenary 1
  • Mercenary 2
  • Mercenary 3
  • Police Detective
  • Police Officer
  • Police Swat 1
  • Police Swat 2
  • Police Agent

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Brett M. Bernstein

Released on July 10, 2010. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requirements: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
